column4: Does anyone know how to enable the ethernet? It was working before! And it's enabled in bios, but nothing is working... :(
what happens if you do "dhclient eth0" ?
How do you do that?
umm errr .. ummm .. do you have a network  icon thingie in your status bar ?
Yes
have you tried setting your ethernet settings there ?
Everything seems fine
you are going to have to brave the big bad command line (menu -> accesories -> terminal)
Alright tell me what I have to do in the terminal
what does "ifconfig -a eth0 |grep inet" give you ?
sudo modprobe -a i810
woops
Hmm the wired connection is called "Auto Ethernet". Do I type that instead of eth0?
its eth0 or eth1 or or or eth2 .. etc
All I'm seeing is Auto Ethernet... I dunno
weird .. then I'm lost .. usually ifconfig gives l0 and eth<something>
What if I change auto ethernet to eth0...?
.. I'm confused .. in the 8+ years I worked with Linux .. I never seen an interface named something other than eth<something>
Well this is actually a friend's computer... I never had much of a problem with mine(the one I'm using now)
I don't understand either
and out of curiosity what does  "cat /etc/lsb-release" say ?
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu DISTRIB_RELEASE=10.4 DISTRIB_CODENAME=lucid DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 10.04.1LTS"
That's all I got
